Be Connected

We are located in the building at the corner of Pacific Coast Highway (PCH) and 5th street in the Bay City Center in Seal Beach, CA. Our space is on the second floor set, like a nest, above the Rocharin Thai Bistro restaurant. There are usually plenty of parking spaces right in front of the stairs that lead to our space. There is also an elevator in the middle quad area.
